item.title: Writing your first Business Model in Hyperledger Composer
item.description: This article focuses on creating a simple business model that helps you with visualizing the abstract nature of Hyperledger Composer’s language. What is Business Network Definition? The Business Network Definition is the core definition that holds the Hyperledger Composer’s programming model. In short, it controls the model definition, the relationship between them, the access control over them and the actions that could be performed on/with them. BND has three core components :
